text: 7.5 Stt 12.7, 13.15, 15.3, 15.18, 17.8, 26.3, 48.4, Lo 2.5 Ñɨn anɨb ak, God Eblaham nop man awl wakay olap ma agak, yokɨp ap yolɨgup agak. Ñapay olap ma tɨkak, ñɨn anɨb ak yokɨp yek agak. God pen Eblaham nop agak, Kɨdek man awl anɨb ak, nad dɨnɨgaban agak. Ñapay nad tɨke, tɨkel tɨk dad amɨl tɨkɨnɨgabal okok, man awl anɨb ak abe dɨl yenɨgabal agak.
